name: SmartWorld Global Token
description: SmartWorld Global Token (SWGT) is your personal key to the blockchain-based products ecosystem. Utility token is developed by SWG Global Ltd (hereinafter - Company) and backed by two promising products: for life - by implementing blockchain technology in transportation and logistics complexes and for work â€“ with the world's first zero commission decentralized work marketplace. The SWGT team has completed and ranked in the top 10% projects on the Certik portal according to the audit results. SWGT or Smart World Global Token is a utility token, backed by two legitimate products: 1. blockchain solutions for transport&infrastructure complexes 2. decentralized freelance marketplace The token utilities are intended to bring new opportunities for life and for work. Those include: 100% safe and transparent transactions, zero-commission when paying in SWGT, automated documentation flow and more.
